SRTSF.summary: Gr. Sarantis S.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades in cosmetics, household products, and parapharmaceutical items in Greece. It operates through four segments: Mass Market Cosmetics, Household Products, Other Sales, and the Private Label Products. The company offers mass market cosmetics, such as fragrances and toiletries; skin, sun, and hair care products; baby shampoos; and other products. It also provides household products, including food care, home care, insect control, shoe care, and professional products. In addition, the company also offers health care products comprising personal hygiene and care products, food supplements, pregnancy and ovulation tests, and sun care products; and luxury cosmetics, including fragrance, treatment, and make up products. The company distributes its products through supermarkets, beauty shops, and pharmacies. Gr. Sarantis S.A. exports its products to approximately 40 countries. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
